definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: A new microcomputerized Fetal Electrocardiograph (FECG) is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹一種微機化胎兒心電圖儀。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a fully computerized cardiac programmable stimulator .
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種全微機化的程控心臟刺激儀系統。

sentences.english: The article introduces the process that the company of Building Boiler manage welding material ration by computer software.
sentences.chinese: 鍋爐生產廠的焊材定額微機化管理的實現過程。

sentences.english: The experiments were carried on a self-made microcomputer-based versatile spectrofluorimeter .
sentences.chinese: 實驗是在自制微機化多功能熒光分光計上進行的。

sentences.english: At the same time, a computerized noise measurement system is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種微機化噪聲測量系統。

sentences.english: Along with large scale integrated circuit and microcomputer's development, modern number system already gradually microcomputer.
sentences.chinese: 計算機的發展，現代數字系統已經逐步微機化。
